title: Canes Corner Podcast: Hanifin an early highlight
text:
You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters More on this More Canes Corner podcasts 
Raleigh, N.C. â€” Carolina Hurricanes TV play-by-play voice John Forslund and Mike Maniscalco break down the team's slow start to the 2015-16 season and explain how it differs from last year's 0 for October. 
Among the highlights in the early going has been rookie defenseman Noah Hanifin, who is already playing beyond his 18 years. It will not be long for him to have more responsibility. 
And expect off-ice distractions to increase for Captain Eric Staal.
